getAppSpecificErrorCode().Description: Returns the app-specific error code passed to @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#Channel#close_E@ if that's the reason for the stream closing, or 0 otherwise.

getCloseReason().Description: Returns one of @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#ChannelApi#ChannelListener#CLOSE_REASON_NORMAL_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#ChannelApi#ChannelListener#CLOSE_REASON_DISCONNECTED_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#ChannelApi#ChannelListener#CLOSE_REASON_REMOTE_CLOSE_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#ChannelApi#ChannelListener#CLOSE_REASON_LOCAL_CLOSE_E@, to indicate the reason for the stream closing.

ChannelIOException(java.lang.String, int.FullName: public ChannelIOException (String message, int closeReason, int appSpecificErrorCode)

ClassDesc: A subclass of @B_java#io#IOException_E@ which can be thrown from the streams returned by @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#Channel#getInputStream_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#Channel#getOutputStream_E@.
